name: WOOT TOOT FREE LOOT
description: Shuffee and Moon River will be cleaning out their inventories with many items to donate. This will be great especially for new sims to start building their homes or businesses! The list is long but will include toilets, showers, butter churns, skill objects, money objects, tables, chairs and more! 1pm-2pm EST / 3pm-4pm ART/BRT

name: The Grand Opening of Hayley's Money House
description: Get ready to win your share of $2 Million running wild with Turkeys! You will be split up into teams running, collecting and stealing turkeys in an action packed event! Gobble Gobble!

description: Come for Bingo Night at The Three Broomsticks, where we will have not one, but TWO rounds of bingo! Double the fun, double the chances to become a millionaire!

name: Christmas Trivia and Skill
description: As we skill, Santa (Papai Noel) will be asking Christmas trivia questions. Mrs. Claus (Mamae Noel) will be baking cookies, Frosty Noel will sing or do bench press to the guests if needed. Prizes will be based on points accumulated. Prizes are...Two Mystic Trees, Gardening gnome, Driveable car, Shrinking crystal, Green sleigh, Giant vegetables, and much more!!! this is 4pm eastern time! I hope you all can come! Look for the NO L on the roof!
